home.title: Hi! I'm Dev Mehta
home.description: I am a Full Stack Web and Android Developer, Part-time Blogger, and Founder at ZeroDay. I love learning new technologies and sharing the most I can. I am mostly developing Web Projects in Django or Android Projects in Java.
